scripts.build: npm i && npm audit fix && cd fe && npm i && npm audit fix && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.restart: cd ./fe && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run dev
scripts.dev: cross-env ENV=dev ASSETS_ROOT=https://webapp.reactale.site URL=https://reactale.site URL_WEBAPP=https://webapp.reactale.site GCP_PROJECT_ID=reactale-dev-1 TALE_BANNER_BUCKET=rtl-dev-1-story-banner GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS='./secrets/gcp/reactale-dev-1-d7ced74faa30.json' SENDGRID_KEY='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' nodemon server.js
scripts.local: cross-env ENV=dev ASSETS_ROOT=http://localhost:5000 URL=http://localhost:9090 URL_WEBAPP=http://localhost:3000 GCP_PROJECT_ID=reactale-dev-1 TALE_BANNER_BUCKET=rtl-dev-1-story-banner GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS='./secrets/gcp/reactale-dev-1-d7ced74faa30.json' SENDGRID_KEY='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' nodemon server.js
